Pacifix looked the infant over with awe inspired optics.  It could not
be left here though. Giant hands moved towards the little pod, and his
fingers gently cupped the body, scooping the creature out of the pod. He
then quickly cradled it to his body, and stood up, begining to head
towards his transport vehicle. 

Hoist just pulled up to the area, and transformed. "I came as fast as I
could Pacifix." Hoist said. 

Pacifix looked the Autobot over. "Good, go with that robot." He said
pointing at Prowl with one hand, he other firmly grasping Eyebright.
"See what you can do to help."

Hoist nodded and headed straight for Prowl, as Pacifix stepped into his
transport area. At his command, a structure extended from the wall, a
bed like thing. He gently placed Eyebright inside a life support cell.
It retracted into the wall. "Good, you'll be safe here." he whispered,
leaving the small transport vehicle.
